content: knitted socks with hearts in drops fabel sizes 35-43 theme valentine pattern fa-498 yarn group a **sizes** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot length 22-24-27 cm leg height approx 13-14-15 cm **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-100 g colour 115 light grey 50-50-50 g colour 106 red needles drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge ** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
